data.name: Command_CheckEligibility_AMH_ContactStaff
data.value: No, the staff will not accelerate this process by request.

data.name: Command_CheckEligibility_AMH_MembershipWithheld
data.value: Your membership is currently on hold due to an administrative override. This means that you will not be granted the Member role automatically.

data.name: Command_CheckEligibility_AMH_WhatToDo
data.value: The staff will override an administrative hold in time when an evaluation of your behavior has been completed by the staff.

data.name: Command_CheckEligibility_AMH_Why
data.value: Your activity has been flagged as unusual by our system. This can happen for a variety of reasons, including antisocial behavior, repeated rule violations in a short period of time, or other behavior that is deemed disruptive.

data.name: Command_CheckEligibility_EligibleEmoji
data.value: :white_check_mark:

data.name: Command_CheckEligibility_EmbedTitle
data.value: Membership Eligibility
data.comment: Title of the embed returned when calling /checkeligibility

data.name: Command_CheckEligibility_Error_Internal
data.value: An internal error has occurred. Please try again later.

data.name: Command_CheckEligibility_IntroductionEligibility
data.value: {0} **Introduction**
data.comment: {0} is an emoji, linked to Command_CheckEligibility_EligibleEmoji and Command_CheckEligibility_NotEligibleEmoji

data.name: Command_CheckEligibility_JoinAgeEligibility
data.value: {0} **Join Age**
data.comment: {0} is an emoji, linked to Command_CheckEligibility_EligibleEmoji and Command_CheckEligibility_NotEligibleEmoji

data.name: Command_CheckEligibility_MessagesEligibility
data.value: {0} **Messages** (last 24 hours)
data.comment: {0} is an emoji, linked to Command_CheckEligibility_EligibleEmoji and Command_CheckEligibility_NotEligibleEmoji

data.name: Command_CheckEligibility_MissingItem_Introduction
data.value: You have not posted an introduction in {0}.
data.comment: {0} is a link to the Introductions channel.

data.name: Command_CheckEligibility_MissingItem_Messages
data.value: You have not posted {0} messages in the past {1} hours.
data.comment: {0} is the number of messages, and {1} is the timeframe in hours they need to send them in.

data.name: Command_CheckEligibility_MissingItem_PunishmentReceived
data.value: You have received a warning or moderator action.

data.name: Command_CheckEligibility_MissingItem_Role
data.value: You are missing {0} {1} role.
data.comment: {0} is an article matched to the value of {1}. For example, "an age role" or "a gender identity role".

data.name: Command_CheckEligibility_MissingItem_TooYoung
data.value: You have not been on the server for {0} hours yet.
data.comment: {0} is the number of hours pulled from config.

data.name: Command_CheckEligibility_ModActionsEligibility
data.value: {0} **Mod Actions**
data.comment: {0} is an emoji, linked to Command_CheckEligibility_EligibleEmoji and Command_CheckEligibility_NotEligibleEmoji

data.name: Command_CheckEligibility_NextRuntimeNote
data.value: The Auto Member System will run <t:{0}:R>. Membership eligibility is subject to change at the time of evaluation.
data.comment: {0} is a unix timestamp measured in seconds.

data.name: Command_CheckEligibility_Error_NoMemberRoles
data.value: You do not have the New Member or Member roles. Please contact staff to have this corrected.

data.name: Command_CheckEligibility_RolesEligibility
data.value: {0} **Roles**
data.comment: {0} is an emoji, linked to Command_CheckEligibility_EligibleEmoji and Command_CheckEligibility_NotEligibleEmoji

data.name: Embed_AMS_Footer
data.value: Instar Auto Member System

data.name: Command_CheckEligibility_Error_AlreadyMember
data.value: You are already a member!

data.name: Command_Eligibility_EligibleText
data.value: At this time, <@{0}> is eligible for membership.
data.comment: {0} is the user's ID.

data.name: Command_Eligibility_IneligibleText
data.value: At this time, <@{0}> is __not__ eligible for membership.
data.comment: {0} is the user's ID.

data.name: Command_Eligibility_Error_AmbiguousHold
data.value: Instar encountered an error while attempting to retrieve AMH details. If the user is otherwise eligible but is not being granted membership, it is possible that they are AMHed. Please try again later.

data.name: Command_Eligibility_Section_AmbiguousHold
data.value: :warning: Possible Auto Member Hold

data.name: Command_Eligibility_Section_Hold
data.value: :warning: Auto Member Hold

data.name: Command_Eligibility_Section_Requirements
data.value: Requirements

data.name: Command_AutoMemberHold_Error_NotGuildMember
data.value: Error while attempting to withhold membership for <@{0}>: User is not a guild member.
data.comment: {0} is the target user ID.

data.name: Command_AutoMemberHold_Error_AlreadyMember
data.value: Error while attempting to withhold membership for <@{0}>: User is already a member.
data.comment: {0} is the target user ID.

data.name: Command_Eligibility_HoldFormat
data.comment: {0} is the moderator ID, {1} is the reason, and {2} is the unix timestamp of the issue date in seconds

data.name: Command_AutoMemberHold_Error_AMHAlreadyExists
data.value: Error while attempting to withhold membership for <@{0}>: User already has an effective membership hold.
data.comment: {0} is the target user ID.

data.name: Command_AutoMemberHold_Error_Unexpected
data.value: Error while attempting to withhold membership for <@{0}>: An unexpected error occurred while configuring the AMH.
data.comment: {0} is the target user ID.

data.name: Command_AutoMemberHold_Success
data.value: Membership for user <@{0}> has been withheld. Staff will be notified in one week to review.
data.comment: {0} is the target user ID.

data.name: Command_AutoMemberUnhold_Error_NotGuildMember
data.value: Error while attempting to remove auto member hold for <@{0}>: User is not a guild member.
data.comment: {0} is the target user ID.

data.name: Command_AutoMemberUnhold_Error_NoActiveHold
data.value: Error while attempting to remove auto member hold for <@{0}>: User does not have an active auto member hold.
data.comment: {0} is the target user ID.

data.name: Command_AutoMemberUnhold_Error_Unexpected
data.value: Error while attempting to remove auto member hold for <@{0}>: An unexpected error has occurred while removing the AMH.
data.comment: {0} is the target user ID.

data.name: Command_AutoMemberUnhold_Success
data.value: Auto member hold for user <@{0}> has been removed.
data.comment: {0} is the target user ID.

data.name: InstarLogoUrl
data.value: https://spacegirl.s3.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/instar.png

data.name: Embed_Page_Footer
data.value: Instar Paging System

data.name: Command_Page_Error_NotAuthorized
data.value: You are not authorized to use this command.

data.name: Command_Page_Error_FullTeamNotAuthorized
data.value: You are not authorized to send a page to the entire staff team.

data.name: Command_Page_Error_NoAllTeamlead
data.value: Failed to send page. The 'All' team does not have a teamleader. If intended to page the owner, please select the Owner as the team.

data.name: Command_Page_Error_Unexpected
data.value: Failed to process command due to an internal server error.

data.name: Command_Page_TestPageMessage
data.value: This is a __**TEST**__ page.

data.name: Command_ReportUser_ReportSent
data.value: Your report has been sent.

data.name: Command_ReportUser_ReportExpired
data.value: Report expired. Please try again.

data.name: Embed_UserReport_Footer
data.value: Instar Message Reporting System

data.name: JoiningConjunction
data.value: and

data.name: Embed_BirthdaySystem_Footer
data.value: Instar Birthday System

data.name: Embed_UnderageUser_WarningTemplate_Member
data.value: <@{0}> has set their birthday to <t:{1}:F> which puts their age as {2} years old.
data.comment: {0} is the user ID, {1} is the user birthday timestamp, and {2} is the user's current age in years.

data.name: Embed_UnderageUser_WarningTemplate_NewMember
data.value:
<@{0}> has set their birthday to <t:{1}:F> which puts their age as {2} years old.
As the user is a new member, their membership has automatically been withheld pending a staff review.
data.comment: {0} is the user ID, {1} is the user birthday timestamp, and {2} is the user's current age in years.

data.name: Command_SetBirthday_NotTimeTraveler
data.value: You are not a time traveler. Your birthday was not set.

data.name: Command_SetBirthday_Error_Unknown
data.value: An unknown error has occurred. Instar developers have been notified.

data.name: Command_SetBirthday_DaysInMonthOutOfRange
data.value: There are only {0} days in {1} {2}. Your birthday was not set.
data.comment: {0} is the number of days in the month {1} of year {2}.

data.name: Command_SetBirthday_MonthsOutOfRange
data.value: There are only 12 months in a year. Your birthday was not set.

data.name: Command_SetBirthday_Underage_AMHReason
data.value: User entered the birthday <t:{0}:F> which indicates they are under the age of {1}.
data.comment: {0} is the user birthday timestamp, {1} is the minimum permissible age.

data.name: Command_SetBirthday_Success
data.value: Your birthday was set to {0}. Your next birthday is <t:{1}:R>.
data.comment: {0} is the date (like "March 1st"), {2} is the timestamp of the user's next birthday.

data.name: Command_SetBirthday_Error_CouldNotSetBirthday
data.value: Your birthday could not be set at this time. Please try again later.

data.name: Command_SetBirthday_Error_AlreadySet
data.value: You have already set your birthday on this server to <t:{0}:F>. If this birthday is in error, please contact staff to reset it for you.
data.comment: {0} is the timestamp of the user's birthday.

data.name: Command_ResetBirthday_Error_UserNotFound
data.value: Could not reset the birthday of user <@{0}>: user was not found in the database.
data.comment: {0] is the user ID.

data.name: Command_ResetBirthday_Success
data.value: Successfully reset the birthday of <@{0}>. The user has been notified by DM.
data.comment: {0} is the user ID.

data.name: Command_ResetBirthday_EndUserNotification
data.value: Your birthday has been reset. You may now set your birthday again using `/setbirthday` in the server.

data.name: Command_ResetBirthday_Error_Unknown
data.value: Could not reset the birthday of <@{0}>: an unknown error has occurred. Please try again later.
data.comment: {0} is the user ID

data.name: Command_ResetBirthday_Error_RemoveBirthdayRole
data.value: Successfully reset the birthday of <@{0}>, but the birthday role could not be automatically removed. The user has been notified of the reset by DM.
data.comment: {0} is the user ID.

data.name: Birthday_Announcement
data.comment: {0} is the ID of the Happy Birthday role, {1} is the list of recipients.

data.name: Embed_Notification_Footer
data.value: Instar Notification System

data.name: Command_AutoMemberHold_NotificationMessage
data.value:
The user listed below has their membership withheld for one week. Please review this member and remove the hold if no further justification exists.
No further reminders regarding this user's hold will be sent.
